name: Tailor Fashion Boutique - Celebrity Mommy's Designer Dresses Fashion Dress up Boutique
name_original: Tailor Fashion Boutique - Celebrity Mommy's Designer Dresses Fashion Dress up Boutique
description:
Let your inner fashion designer out, take out your fashion designer and tailoring skills together and become the ultimate fashion designer and stylist dress maker with fashion princess boutique and tailor in this dress up game.

Fashion design and create your own customize clothes and dresses, beauty makeovers and leave a superstar celebrity statement!


Choose a famous celebrity like character and start your ultimate fashion journey to be the most creative fashion stylist among superstars and celebrities. Choose your favourite color for fabric for perfect fashion makeover, dress-up, makeup, spa and salon for celebrity like beauty princesses. Treat yourself as a celebrity star dress maker and create awesome fashion makeovers, dress up, makeup and a lavish spa salon in this dress up game from casual games category.

Create, design and customize from a huge range of dress up and makeovers by selecting your favorite clothing, prints, patterns, hats and other beautiful designer made accessories along with fabulous start like dress up. It's December Merry Christmas boys and baby girls.

Features

- Character: Select from 3 cute beauty princesses.
- Clothing: Select from your favorite fashion designer made fabric available in a variety of different colors.
- Cutting & Stitching: Design and then cut, stitching and sewing your creation.
- Designing: Design your dress with add-ons such as laces, frills, buttons and much more.
- Try Room: Try on different creations in the dress up room and give yourself the most stylish makeover and makeup for the fair.
